name: Little Wizard Sally
description:
★Retro Magical RPG(!) Little Wizard SALLY★
If you’re a player looking for a game but are tired of simple arcade games,
then this is a mini game made just for you! Little Wizard SALLY!

[World view]
The strange ghosts begin to attack the village one silent night
and Wizard Sally decides to step forward to bring back peace to the village!
Get rid of the ghosts using fire, water, wind and ultimate thunder magic, and protect the village!
Sally is fighting all alone again tonight...☆

[How to play]
- Combine the fire, water and wind card magic and get rid of the ghosts!
- You must follow the order when making a spell above the head of the ghost!
- You can use a stronger thunder magic when the skill gauge is full!

[TIP]
- You can only attack the Dracula Boss when his cape is open wide.
- The Bomb Ogre only aims for your card! (๑`^´๑)+
